portfolioItems.title: PCH Keno
portfolioItems.description: Users pick numbers from 5 game cards with live drawings every 20 minutes where users match numbers for cash prizes.  Users also unlock various instant win scratch cards for playing cards and watching video ads.  For this project, we used a custom MVC js framework that handled gameplay, live drawings, and the overall user flow while making API calls to the backend to handle sending and receiving gameplay data.  Implemented many shared and 3rd party systems responsible for user registration, messaging, tracking, and retention
portfolioItems.technology: Javascript (ES6), MVC, Webpack, Gulp, Git, ESLint, Prettier, HTML5/CSS3, PHP (Laravel), SEO

portfolioItems.title: PCH Lotto

Implemented many shared and 3rd party systems responsible for user registration, messaging, tracking, and retention
